item.title: Help me out? Rep++
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

OK… So I’ve been trying to do this for about 3 days now… No answers… Here is my code for my FunPK area:

} else if (isInBattleField()) {
wildLevel = (126);
getPA().sendFrame126("Battle Field Points: ", 4536);
getPA().walkableInterface(4535);
}

Now, the reason I have to do this is cause it’s not allowing me to attack others in my new battle field thing (-50 wildy). So I made this code and put it into client.java with the rest of the stuff like this. It still doesn’t work. I don’t know if I have to put it into more than one place or not, but I only put it under process() (I know it’s not a good thing to clog up the process method but I’m desperate to get this working). So, if you can help that will be great! Thanks!

Read full topic
